wrangler 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    add_prefix()

    Add a prefix in a dataframe column

    add_suffix()

    Add a suffix in a dataframe column

    check_col_miss()

    Chech for columns missing values

    check_row_miss()

    Chech for rows missing values

    chr_string()

    Return character into a vector (you can copy into r source file instead of writing it manually)

    del_cols()

    Delete columns in a dataframe

    del_rows()

    Delete rows in a dataframe

    facet_plots()

    Automatically create faceted plot with ggplot2

    getpercent()

    Get percentage of a "variable" in data

    get_categ_var()

    Get categorical variable in a dataframe

    get_mode()

    Get mode of a vector

    get_num_var()

    Get numerical variable in a dataframe

    get_package_name()

    Get package name

    index_col() index_col()

    Get index of a dataframe column by name, or get a name by index

    index_val()

    Get index of a value in dataframe, row or colum or both

    is.wholenumber()

    Test a number for being an integer or not

    loadpackages()

    Loading packages

    load_movies_data()

    Load movies and myMovieData dataset in global environment

    mchisq.test()

    Get Chi-square test of a specific variable with other categorical variables in a dataframe

    mrfreqtable()

    Get multiple response frequency tables

    nearRcolor()

    Getting near r colors

    `%!in%`

    x not in y: %!in%

    other_names()

    get remaining names of a dataframe

    plotCol()

    Comparing Colors

    prime_numbers()

    Get the prime numbers of up to a number(n)

    reload()

    Reload a package or name space

    renamer()

    Renaming dataframe columns

    renamer_Old()

    Renaming dataframe columns (Old version similar to plyr::rename())

    rm_col_miss()

    Remove columns with missing values

    rm_miss()

    remove row or columns with percentage of missing values

    rm_prefix()

    Remove a prefix in a dataframe column

    rm_row_miss()

    Remove rows with missing values

    rm_suffix()

    Remove a suffix in a dataframe column

    sampler()

    Generate random sample from a random numbers

    slice_col()

    Slice a dataframe column by a seperator

    slice_col_old()

    Slice a dataframe column by a seperator

    stat_calc()

    Calculate summary statistic for numerical variables

    summarySE()

    Automatically create summary standard error for plotting error bar in ggplot2
